description.short: AI-powered colleague for seamless team collaboration
description.full: Thun.ai is an intelligent AI assistant designed to enhance team productivity and collaboration. It provides instant support for work tasks, creative brainstorming, project planning, and daily workflow optimization. Powered by advanced AI technology, Thun.ai acts as your dedicated digital colleague, offering personalized assistance while maintaining a professional and friendly approach to workplace communication.

commands.title: How can you help me?
commands.description: Discover what Thun.ai can do to boost your productivity

commands.title: Let's brainstorm ideas
commands.description: Get creative assistance for projects and problem-solving
